name: Breve
description: Rich and bold espresso made from freshly ground beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso cut with a small amount of warm milk to reduce acidity.

name: latte
description: A classic coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Cold Beverages
description: A coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

name: mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte.

name: Ice Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, often sweetened or flavored.
